Instance.description: Instance that holds information about a royalty payment.

TunableList.name: pay_curve
TunableList.description: This curve represents payment over time. The X-axis is payment number, and the Y-axis is the amount of money to be paid. There MUST be at least two entries in this. One entry for the first payment and one entry for the final payment. If you don't do this, there will be no payments received. The first payment will be X=1. The player will not get any payments where X is tuned to 0.

Tunable.name: pay_forever
Tunable.description: If enabled, the final payment will continue to happen forever. If disabled, the final payment will, in fact, be the final payment.

Tunable.name: payment_deviation_percent
Tunable.description: Once the payment amount is decided (using the Pay Curve and the Payment Multipliers), it will be multiplied by this number then added to and subtracted from the final payment amount to give a min and max. Then, a random amount between the min and max will be chosen and awarded to the player. Example: After using the Payment Curve and the Payment Multipliers, we get a payment amount of $10. The Payment Deviation is 0.2. $10 x 0.2 = 2 Min = $10 - 2 = $8 Max = $10 + 2 = $12 Final Payment will be some random amount between $8 and $12, inclusively.

TunableTuple.name: payment_multipliers
TunableTuple.description: A list of test sets which, if they pass, will provide a multiplier to each royalty payment. These tests are only checked when the royalties start and are applied to every payment. They do not get tested before each payment is sent. All tests will run, so all multipliers that pass will get multiplied together and then multiplied to each payment amount.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableEnum.name: payment_tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag that will be passed along with the royalty payment. This is the tag that will be used for aspirations/achievements.

TunableEnum.name: royalty_recipient
TunableEnum.description: This is the Sim earning the money. This should always be a Sim (Actor, TargetSim, PickedSim, etc.).

TunableEnum.name: royalty_subject
TunableEnum.description: This is the participant whose name will be used as the object that is earning the money. Supported types are objects (Object, PickedObject, etc.) and Unlockable (for music). Other object types might work but have not been tested.

TunableEnum.name: royalty_type
TunableEnum.description: The royalty type this entry belongs to. This is the section in the notification in which it will show.
